text: وَنُرِيدُ أَن نَّمُنَّ عَلَى ٱلَّذِينَ ٱسۡتُضۡعِفُواْ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَنَجۡعَلَهُمۡ أَئِمَّةٗ وَنَجۡعَلَهُمُ ٱلۡوَٰرِثِينَ
translation: 5. Kaadu baaxô bagul firqawni yussuqunxeeh boolayse mara (israa-iil xaylo kinnuk) muxxusnaah keenih namqeeh kayrih kataatan mirocti ken abnaah, baaxó nagra mara ken abnaamat ken gunnam fanna firqawnaa kee kay mara bayisneek gamadal iyye Yalli.
